tech.ferus.util.sql.databases

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • tech.ferus.util.sql.databases.Database
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MySqlDatabase, SqliteDatabase

    public abstract class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple Connection getter for c3p0.
